desc: Love yourself and support students in Nicaragua. Luxurious lavender bath soaps, teas, and scrubs – all handmade in Oregon by 8 year old Gracie Jay. 10% of proceeds goes to Gracies charity of choice, a school called "Colegio Cristiano El Padul"

layout.text: Handmade Lavender Products by 8 Year Old Gracie Jay, with a 10% Give Back Pledge
